message: I understand you want a fair split, but the value decreases for both of us each round.  This offer gives us both a better deal than waiting.
I'll compromise, but I still want a bit more
Alice, we're getting dangerously close to losing it all. This offer is the most balanced we'll get at this point.
Getting desperate, meet me in the middle
This is ridiculous, Alice.  A 50/50 split is the only fair deal at this point. Take it or leave it.
